name: GidZone
tag_list: social-network, classifieds, free-classifieds, classified-ads, service-providers, professionals, business-social-networking, word-of-mouth, networking, career, skills, promotion, free-classifieds-directories, free-online-classified
overview:
GidZone is a free Social tool for anyone who wishes to create & design a personal or business profile accessible to the public, connect with friends & colleagues and promote their services & skills.

Through GidZone you can create your personal space on the web and design it any way you like, connect with your friends, colleagues and customers, publish your services & skills, upload images and build your reputation on the web.

GidZone incorporates a mutual rating system where, in addition to reading and writing feedbacks, you can see whoâ€™s hired by people you know and request for their recommendations, as well as ask your customers to provide feedback in case you publish a service offer. Privacy controls allow you to easily configure who sees what you post (for example - you can choose that only your first degree friends would be able to see your name next to your feedbacks).

GidZone also has advance searching tools for finding people and services anywhere.
